tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.recyclerview

Class RecyclerViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.recyclerview.RecyclerViewModel

  • public class RecyclerViewModel
extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
    Handles the storing and synchronising of the RecyclerView's settings across all of the fragments
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael McKey
